statements: UPDATE GenderEqualityAnalysis SET year=2020, discrimination_score=8.5 WHERE country='USA' AND gender='Female' AND discrimination_type='Pay Gap';
UPDATE GenderEqualityAnalysis SET discrimination_score=7.2, gender='Male' WHERE year=2019 AND country='Canada' AND discrimination_type='Promotion Bias';
UPDATE GenderEqualityAnalysis SET discrimination_score = 8.5 WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2020 AND gender = 'Female' AND discrimination_type = 'Pay Gap'
UPDATE GenderEqualityAnalysis SET discrimination_score = 7.2, discrimination_type = 'Promotion Bias' WHERE year = 2019 AND country = 'Japan' AND gender = 'Male'
UPDATE GenderEqualityData SET equality_score = 80.5 WHERE country = 'United States' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE DiscriminationStats SET discrimination_count = 1000, country = 'France' WHERE year = 2020;
UPDATE GenderEqualityData SET equality_score = 75.5 WHERE country = 'France' AND year = 2020 AND gender = 'Female';
UPDATE DiscriminationStats SET discrimination_count = 1000, discrimination_type = 'Racial Discrimination' WHERE year = 2019 AND country = 'USA';
UPDATE gender_equality SET equality_score = 90 WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE discrimination_cases SET reported_date = '2022-10-15', discrimination_type = 'Workplace' WHERE case_id = 101;
UPDATE gender_equality SET equality_score = 90 WHERE country = 'Sweden' AND gender = 'Female';
UPDATE discrimination_cases SET reported_date = '2022-06-30', reported_by = 'Human Rights Watch' WHERE country = 'Argentina' AND discrimination_type = 'Race';
UPDATE gender_equality_data SET value = 5.8 WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2020
UPDATE discrimination_cases SET outcome = 'Resolved' WHERE country = 'Germany' AND case_date = '2021-06-15'
UPDATE gender_equality_data SET value = 0.75 WHERE country = 'Sweden' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE discrimination_cases SET outcome = 'Resolved', case_description = 'Equal pay discrimination case resolved' WHERE country = 'United States' AND case_id = 'D1234';
UPDATE gender_equality_facts SET value = 0.75 WHERE country = 'Sweden' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE gender_equality_reports SET author = 'Maria Jones', summary = 'Updated summary' WHERE report_date = '2021-09-15';
UPDATE gender_equality_facts SET value = 0.75 WHERE country = 'Sweden' AND year = 2020
UPDATE discrimination_cases SET case_description = 'Updated description', country = 'Canada' WHERE case_date = '2021-05-15'
